entry.title: Promise å¹¶å‘é™åˆ¶
entry.content:
function asyncPool(poolLimit, array, iteratorFn) {
let i = 0;
const ret = [];
const executing = [];
const enqueue = function () {
// è¾¹ç•Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œarrayä¸ºç©ºæ•°ç»„
if (i === array.length) {
return Promise.resolve();
}
// æ¯è°ƒä¸€æ¬¡enqueueï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªpromise
const item = array[i++];
const p = Promise.resolve().then(() => iteratorFn(item, array));
// æ”¾å…¥promisesæ•°ç»„
ret.push(p);
// promiseæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•ï¼Œä»executingæ•°ç»„ä¸­åˆ é™¤
const e = p.then(() => executing.splice(executing.indexOf(e), 1));
// æ’å…¥executingæ•°å­—ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„promise
executing.push(e);
// ä½¿ç”¨Promise.receï¼Œæ¯å½“executingæ•°ç»„ä¸­promiseæ•°é‡ä½äºpoolLimitï¼Œå°±å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ–°çš„promiseå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œ
let r = Promise.resolve();
if (executing.length >= poolLimit) {
r = Promise.race(executing);
}
// é€’å½’ï¼Œç›´åˆ°éå†å®Œarray
return r.then(() => enqueue());
};
return enqueue().then(() => Promise.all(ret));
}

entry.title: å„ç§æ’åº
entry.content:
// éå†ä¸€é

// äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ iteration
function binary_search(array,key){
var low = 0;
var high = array.length -1;

while(low <=high){
    var mid = Math.floor((low+high)/2)
    if(array[mid] ==key){
        return mid
    }
    else if(array[mid]<key){
        low = mid+1
    }
    else if(array[mid]>key){
        high = mid-1
    }
    else{
        return -1
    }
}

}

// Bubble sort

function swap(obj, a, b) { var tmp = obj[a]; obj[a] = obj[b]; obj[b] = tmp; }

function bubbleSort(arr) {
let len = arr.length;

for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
for (let j = 0; j < len - i - 1; j++) {
if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) { // ç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ ä¸¤ä¸¤å¯¹æ¯”
swap(array,j,j+1)
}
}
}

return arr;
}

var array = [3,5,1,2,3,5,6,7]
var result = bubbleSort(array);
console.log(result)

// selection sort

function swap(obj, a, b) { var tmp = obj[a]; obj[a] = obj[b]; obj[b] = tmp; }

function selection_sort(array){
var len = array.length
if(array==null || array.length<=2){
return array
}

for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
    var min = i
    for (let j = i+1; j < len; j++) {
        if(array[j]<array[min]){
            min =j
        }
    }
              swap(array,i,min)

}

}
var array = [3,5,1,2,3,5,6,7]
var result = selection_sort(array);
console.log(array)

//insertion sort

function insertion_sort(arr){
for (var i = 1, length = arr.length; i < length; i++) {
var key = arr[i];
var j = i - 1;
while (j >= 0 && arr[j] > key) {
arr[j + 1] = arr[j];
j--;
}
arr[j + 1] = key;
}
return arr;

}
var array = [3,5,1,2,3,5,6,7]
var result = insertion_sort(array);
console.log(result)

// merge Sort
function mergeSort(arr) { // é‡‡ç”¨è‡ªä¸Šè€Œä¸‹çš„é€’å½’æ–¹æ³•
var length = arr.length;
if (length < 2) {
return arr;
}

var middle = Math.floor(length / 2);
var left = arr.slice(0, middle);
var right = arr.slice(middle);

return merge(mergeSort(left), mergeSort(right));

}

function merge(left, right) {
var result = [];
console.log('left', left, 'right', right);
while (left.length && right.length) {
if (left[0] <= right[0]) {
result.push(left.shift());
} else {
result.push(right.shift());
}
}

while (left.length) {
  result.push(left.shift());
}

while (right.length) {
  result.push(right.shift());
}
return result;

}

var array = [3,5,1,2,3,5,6,7]
var result = mergeSort(array);
console.log(result)

// å¯¹æ•°å™¨

//è¦æµ‹è¯•çš„æ–¹æ³•
function insertSort(arr) {
for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
for (let j = i - 1; j >= 0 && arr[j] > arr[j + 1]; j--) {
[arr[j], arr[j + 1]] = [arr[j + 1], arr[j]];
}
}
}
//æ­£ç¡®çš„æ–¹æ³•
function rightMethod(arr) {
arr.sort((a, b)=>a - b);
}
//éšæœºæ•°ç»„ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ï¼Œsizeä¸ºæœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ï¼Œvalueä¸ºæœ€å¤§å€¼
function generateRandomArray(size, value) {
//ç”Ÿæˆé•¿åº¦éšæœºçš„æ•°ç»„
let arr = new Array(Math.floor((size + 1) * Math.random()));
for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
arr[i] = Math.floor((value + 1) * Math.random());
}
return arr;
}
//æ‹·è´æ•°ç»„æ–¹æ³•
function copyArray(arr) {
if (arr == null) {
return null;
}
return [].concat(arr);
}
//æ¯”å¯¹æ–¹æ³•
function isEqual(arr1, arr2) {
if ((arr1 == null && arr2 != null ) || (arr1 != null && arr2 == null)) {
return false;
}
if (arr1 == null && arr2 == null) {
return true;
}
if (arr1.length != arr2.length) {
return false;
}
for (let i = 0; i < arr1.length; i++) {
if (arr1[i] != arr2[i]) {
return false
}
}
return true;
}
//æµ‹è¯•
function Test() {
let testTimes = 5000;
let size = 10;
let value = 100;
let succeed = true;
for (let i = 0; i < testTimes; i++) {
let arr1 = generateRandomArray(size, value);
let arr2 = copyArray(arr1);
let arr3 = copyArray(arr1);
insertSort(arr1);
rightMethod(arr2);
if (!isEqual(arr1, arr2)) {
succeed = false;
console.log(arr3);
break;
}
}
console.log(succeed ? "nice" : "Fucking fucked");
}
Test();

entry.title: å¯»æ‰¾documentå…¨éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹
entry.content:
function getElCount(n){ //å®šä¹‰æ–‡æ¡£å…ƒç´ ç»Ÿè®¡å‡½æ•°
var num = 0; //åˆå§‹åŒ–å˜é‡
if(n.nodeType == 1){ //æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹
num++; //å¦‚æœæ˜¯ï¼Œè®¡æ•°å™¨åŠ 1
console.log(n.nodeName); //è¾“å‡ºå…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹åç§°
}
var son = n.childNodes; //è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹
for(var i=0 ; i<son.length ; i++){ //éå†æ¯ä¸ªå­å…ƒç´ 
num += getElCount(son[i]); //é€’å½’æ“ä½œ
}
return num; //è¿”å›ç»Ÿè®¡å€¼
}
window.onload=function(){
console.log('æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­å…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¯ï¼š'+getElCount(document)+'ä¸ª')
}

entry.title: å…¨æ’åˆ—
entry.content:
var permute = function(nums) {
const list = [];
backtrack(list, [], nums)
return list
};

function backtrack(list,templist,num){
if(templist.length === num.length){
list.push([...templist])
}
for(let i=0;i<num.length;i++){
if(templist.includes(num[i])){
continue;
}
templist.push(num[i]);
backtrack(list,templist,num);
templist.pop()
}
}

var permute = function(nums) {
let n = nums.length;
nums = nums.sort((a,b) => {return a - b});
let res = [];
let tmpPath = [];
let hash = {};
let backtrack = (tmpPath) => {
if(tmpPath.length == n){
res.push(tmpPath);
return;
}
for(let i = 0;i < n;i++){
if(hash[i] || (i > 0 && !hash[i-1] && nums[i-1] == nums[i])) continue;
hash[i] = true;
tmpPath.push(nums[i]);
backtrack([...tmpPath]);
hash[i] = false;
tmpPath.pop();
}
}
backtrack(tmpPath);
return res;
}

// merge Sort
function mergeSort(arr) { // é‡‡ç”¨è‡ªä¸Šè€Œä¸‹çš„é€’å½’æ–¹æ³•
var length = arr.length;
if (length < 2) {
return arr;
}

var middle = Math.floor(length / 2);
var left = arr.slice(0, middle);
var right = arr.slice(middle);

return merge(mergeSort(left), mergeSort(right));

}

function merge(left, right) {
var result = [];
console.log('left', left, 'right', right);
while (left.length && right.length) {
if (left[0] <= right[0]) {
result.push(left.shift());
} else {
result.push(right.shift());
}
}

while (left.length) {
  result.push(left.shift());
}

while (right.length) {
  result.push(right.shift());
}
return result;

}

var array = [3,5,1,2,3,5,6,7]

entry.title: matrix_clodckspin
entry.content:
function printMatrix(matrix)
{
// write code here

var row = matrix.length;
var col = matrix[0].length;
   

var res = [];
if(row ==0 || col == 0){
    return null;
}

var left = 0; var right = col - 1; var top=0; var bottom = row-1;

while(left<= right && top <= bottom ){
    
    for(var i =left; i<= right; i++){
        res.push(matrix[top][i]);
    }
    for(var i = top+1; i<= bottom;i++ ){
        res.push(matrix[i][right]);
    }
    if(top != bottom){
        for (var i = right-1;i>= left;i--){
            res.push(matrix[bottom][i]);
        }
    }
    if(left != right){
        for (var i = bottom-1 ; i> top;i--){
            res.push(matrix[i][left]);
        }
    }
  left = left+1;  
  top = top+1;
  right = right -1;
   bottom = bottom -1; 
}
return res;

}

entry.title: quick sort
entry.content:
// quick sort

function quicksort(array){
if(array.length<2){
return array;
}

var piviotindex = Math.floor(array.length/2)
var pivot = array.splice(piviotindex,1)[0];
var left =[];
var right = [];

for(var i =0;i<array.length;i++){
    if(array[i]<pivot){
        left.push(array[i])
    }
    else{
        right.push(array[i])
    }
}

return quicksort(left).concat([pivot],quicksort(right))

}

////////////////////
function quickSort(arr, left, right) {
if (Object.prototype.toString.call(arr).slice(8, -1) === 'Array' && typeof length === 'number' && typeof right === 'number') {

  if (left < right) {
    var pivot = arr[left]; // èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®
    var setPos = left + 1; // è®¾ç½®çš„ä½ç½®
    for (var i = left + 1; i <= right; i++) {
      if (arr[i] < pivot) {
        swap(arr,i,setPos)
        setPos++;
      }
    }
    // å¾ªç¯å®Œæˆä¹‹åå°†keyä¸ pos-1çš„ä½ç½®äº¤æ¢
    swap(arr,left,setPos-1)

    // console.log('æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡æ’åº', 'å½“å‰keyå€¼===>', key, 'æ’åºå®Œæˆå½“å‰æ•°ç»„===>', JSON.stringify(arr));

    quickSort(arr, left, setPos - 2);
    quickSort(arr, setPos, right);
    // console.log('arr=======>', arr);
  }
} else {
  return 'array is not an Array or left or right is not a number!';
}
return arr;

}

function swap(obj, a, b) { var tmp = obj[a]; obj[a] = obj[b]; obj[b] = tmp; }

var arr = [3, 44, 38, 5, 47, 15, 36, 26, 27, 2, 46, 4, 19, 50, 48];
// var arr = [7, 3, 2, 10, 13, 8, 5];
console.log(quickSort(arr, 0, arr.length - 1));//[2, 3, 4, 5, 15, 19, 26, 27, 36, 38, 44, 46, 47, 48, 50]

entry.title: Heap sort
entry.content:
function swap(obj, a, b) { var tmp = obj[a]; obj[a] = obj[b]; obj[b] = tmp; }

function bubbleup(array,index){
const parentindex = Math.floor((index-1)/2)
if(array[parentindex] && array[parentindex]<array[index]){
swap(array,parentindex,index)
bubbleup(array,parentindex);
}
return;
}

function bubbledown(arr,index,size){
var left = index * 2 + 1;
while (left < size) {
var largest = left + 1 < size && arr[left + 1] > arr[left] ? left + 1 : left;
largest = arr[largest] > arr[index] ? largest : index;
if (largest == index) {
break;
}
swap(arr, largest, index);
index = largest;
left = index * 2 + 1;
}
}

function heapSort(arr) {
if (arr == null || arr.length < 2) {
return;
}

for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    bubbleup(arr, i);
}
var size = arr.length;
swap(arr, 0, --size);
while (size > 0) {
    bubbledown(arr, 0, size);
    swap(arr, 0, --size);
}

}

var arr = [91, 60, 96, 13, 35, 65, 46, 65, 10, 30, 20, 31, 77, 81, 22];
heapSort(arr);
console.log(arr)

entry.title: åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’å¸¸è§é¢˜
entry.content:
ä»£é‡‘åˆ¸ç»„åˆğŸ˜dp
function coinChange(coins,amount){
let dp = new Array(amount+1).fill(Infinity)
dp[0]=0;
for(let coin of coins){
for(let i =1;i<=amount;i++){
if(i-coin>=0){
dp[i]=Math.min(dp[i],dp[i-coin]+1)
}
}
}

return dp[amount] === Infinity ? 'Impossible' : dp[amount];

}

æœ€å°è·¯å¾„å’Œï¼š
function minPath(grid){
let m = grid.length;
let n = grid[0].length;

for(let i =m-1;i>=0;i--){
    for(let j=n-1;j>=0;j--){
        if (i + 1 < m && j + 1 < n) {
            grid[i][j] += Math.min(grid[i + 1][j], grid[i][j + 1])
        } else if (i + 1 < m) {
            grid[i][j] += grid[i + 1][j]
        } else if (j + 1 < n) {
            grid[i][j] += grid[i][j + 1]
        }
    }
}
return grid[0][0];

}

01 èƒŒåŒ…
var line=readline().split(' ');
var N=parseInt(line[0]);//æ‰¿é‡
var c=parseInt(line[1]);//æ•°é‡
var w=[0],p=[0];//é‡ ä»·å€¼
while(lines=readline()){
let nums=lines.split(' ').map(Number);
p.push(nums[0])//;
w.push(nums[1]);
}
function DyadicArray(N, c, w, p) {
//åˆå§‹åŒ–è¡¨æ ¼
var dp = new Array(N + 1); //è¡¨æ ¼æœ‰n+1è¡Œ
for (let n = 0; n < N + 1; n++) {
dp[n] = new Array(c + 1).fill(0); //æ¯è¡Œæœ‰c+1åˆ—
}

for (let i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
for (let j = 0; j <= c; j++) {
if (j - w[i] >= 0) {
dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i - 1][j - w[i]] + p[i]);
} else {
dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];
}
}
}
return(dp[N][c])
}
console.log(DyadicArray(N, c, w, p))

æœ€é•¿å…¬å…±å­åºåˆ—

var longestCommonSubsequence = function(text1, text2) {
let n = text1.length;
let m = text2.length;
let dp = Array.from(new Array(n+1),() => new Array(m+1).fill(0));

for(let i =1;i<=n;i++){
    for(let j=1;j<=m;j++){
        if(text1[i-1]===text2[j-1]){
            dp[i][j] = 1+dp[i-1][j-1];
        }
        else{
            dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1])
        }
    }
}
return dp[n][m]

};

01 èƒŒåŒ…ï¼š
function kanpSack(capacity, weights, values, n) {
var a,b,dp = []

//é¦–å…ˆï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–ç”¨äºå¯»æ‰¾è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆçš„çŸ©é˜µKS[n+1][capacity+1]
for (var i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
dp[i] = [];
}
for (var i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
for (var j = 0; j <= capacity; j++) {
if (i === 0 || j === 0) {
//è®©ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œå’Œç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—ä¸º0ï¼Œå› ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œå’Œç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—è¡¨ç¤ºå®¹é‡ä¸º0æˆ–æ²¡æœ‰ç‰©å“å¯è£…
dp[i][j] = 0;
} else if (weights[i - 1] > j) {
dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j]; //å½“å‰ç‰©å“é‡é‡å¤§äºå½“å‰å®¹é‡
} else {
//å½“å‰ç‰©å“é‡é‡å°äºå½“å‰å®¹é‡ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªé€‰æ‹©ï¼Œè£…æˆ–è€…ä¸è£…ï¼Œå–ä»·å€¼æœ€å¤§çš„
a = dp[i - 1][j - weights[i - 1]] + values[i - 1]; //è£…å…¥è¿™ä¸ªç‰©å“åçš„æ€»ä»·å€¼
b = dp[i - 1][j]; //ä¸è£…
dp[i][j] = Math.max(a,b)
}
}

}
return dp[n][capacity];

}

ä¸åŒçš„äºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘
var numTrees = function(n) {
let dp = new Array(n+1).fill(0);
dp[0] = 1
dp[1] = 1
for (let i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
for (let j = 1; j <= i; ++j) {
dp[i] += dp[j-1] * dp[i-j];
}
}
return dp[n]
};

æ— é‡å¤å­—ç¬¦çš„æœ€é•¿å­ä¸²

var lengthOfLongestSubstring = function(s) {

let max = 0;
let arr = [];
for(let i =0;i<s.length;i++){
    let index = arr.indexOf(s[i]);
    if(index !== -1){
        arr.splice(0,index+1)
    }
    arr.push(s[i]);
    max = Math.max(arr.length,max)
}
return max

};
